attributes.action: Ban the smoking of any goods from behind the wheel of a motorvehicle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to see a ban on the smoking of any good from behind the wheel of a moving motorvehicle. Smoking behind the wheel of a moving motorvehicle is a distraction from the road and does cause accidents. It would also provide another incentive for current smokers to give up.
